/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements and signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the bustling activity below. Power lines crisscross above the street, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
